import numpy as np # linear algebra

from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
import plotly.express as pl
from plotly.subplots import make_subplots
import plotly.graph_objs as go
import seaborn as sb


import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))
        
%matplotlib inline

source.9d958247: # What did we learn about our fellow <font color=#29EAEE size="+3">Kagglers</font> ?
source.9a6e2ac5:
Occupation Vs. Gender

Occupationally , Magicians are classified into - Students, Data Engineer, Software Engineer, Data Scientist, Data Analyst, Research Scientist, Unemployed, Statistician, Managers, Machine Learning Engineer , Business Analyst and Database Engineer. Both men and women represent the Student category majorly , then followed by Data Scientists and Software Engineer.
source.73151155:
Education Vs. Country

The countrywise education shows the user base of Kaggle. Most of the Indians are Undergraduates , or students , whereas the USA has almost equal number of UndergGrads and PostGrads. These two Educational levels are majorly represented all throughout the world.
source.4622c470:
Kagglers Old and Young :

The magicians were of different age. There were young and old , with varied experience.The Vicenarians were more in numbers , who were full of zeal and energy. Then there were the Denarians , learning the art of storytelling. And then followed the Tricenarians , Quadragenarians and Quinquagenarians. The old and learned were few in number , but were very valueable for their Experience in the Art.
source.3b9bdaea:
Countrywise Distribution :

We can see down below , that the two majorly represented country are opposite. The number of Kagglers from India have risen in 2020 , whereas the opposite in USA. As stated earlier , that there are more students , because we have seen that India has many student participants and the rise in number of Users from India supports the inference.
source.5e66a46c:
Age Vs. Country

Here we can see that the majorly represented countries - India , Usa and others , have Magicians from various age groups. In India , the age group 25-29 is majorly represented , followed by 40-44 and 45-49 age group. Where as in the USA , people are from 25-29 , 35-39 , 40-44 , 45-49 and even 70+ age groups.This gives an idea , that Data science is new in India.
source.d45b250d: * We can see a rise in the number of responses.
source.e135c144:
Getting the facts cleaned:

The magical land of Kaggle , asked the magicians some questions , so that we can get to know about them , and keep them in the Old book 📘of records.
source.5db97924:
Age Distribution :

In 2019 , the major age groups were lesser in count , where as in 2020 , the margin is great for 18-21 age group (by approx. 1000) , and there is a rise in numbers in the age groups 22-24 , 25-29 and 30-34 too. This means that the user base of Kaggle has more students in it.
source.a327add4:
Education Distribution :

Here we can see that there is a rise in the number of Users with a Bachelor's degree , and a dip in the number of Users with Master's degree. Which is congruent to the rise in Indian users and the opposite with American users , because earlier we have seen that the former country has more Undergrads and the latter has more Postgrads. Evenly the number of Doctorates has declined too , because of the decrease in number of users from the USA.
source.b5ba2ed1:
Occupation Distribution :

With respect to the speculations seen earlier , we can see the rise in Students , with the rise in Indian Users , and we can see the decrease in Data Scientists and Software Engineers , with the decline of American users. We can also see there is a rise in the number of Unemployed users , probably the reason behind so is the unfortunate doings of the COVID-19.
source.470b6105:
The School of Witchcraft and Wizardy !!

The magicians are of various Educational background. Most of them are Masters , and then there are Undergraduates. Then we have the learned and experienced Philosophers. Here , there were many competitions. One has to play with spells, one has to showcase their skills , and whoever can catch the snitch as accurately as possible is the winner. One starts as a Novice , then becomes a Contributor , then an Expert. After much hardwork , one becomes a Master and finally a Grand Master.
source.645a23cf:
Introduction :

This is the Story of the Kagglers , who are great storytellers , who can make boring Columns of Excel Sheet , look amazing. Don't you feel curious about who these Magicians are ? Where are they from , are they Wizards or Wizardess ,which Lands do they come from ? Let me tell you the story of the story tellers , because they have taught me their magic. Though I am a Novice , but I want to become one like them too.
source.117b2ebe: A Lot Can Happen In A Year !
source.8024e466:
Gender Difference :

In 2019 , we can see there are 4 classifications of Gender - Male , Female , Prefer to Self Describe and Prefer not to Say. In 2020 , a new group was added , Nonbinary. Now , in 2020 , participation of women is more than 2019, which is nice , though the margin is not huge.
source.0fa62bfb:
Divided by the Lands United By Magic :

We can see that the magicians are from all over the globe. However there are many magicians majorly from India , United States of America. This is how Data Science has brought so many magicians from more than fifty five countries , together under the umbrella. This shows how Data Science and AI has opened new horizons accross the globe.
source.ec7e0fe1: * Loading the old data from 2019 Kaggle survey
source.35dd522e:
Wizardesses and Wizards :

The story of the Wizards and Wizardesses is very interesting. In the beginning , the Art was known to the men but as time went by , the women started learning the spells and now there are Wizardesses , who have achieved great honours for their prowess. And in the future there will be more of them making the community strong!!! And then there are Magicians who are great in the Art , irrespective of their Genders.
source.3c2024ba: * Renaming the columns as per the Questions
source.57f52926:
Education Vs. Gender

The Magicians are of different Educational backgrounds, most of it being from a Post Graduation level , Under Graduation level and from Doctoral level.There are men from all three majority backgrounds as mentioned above , but the women are more from Post Grad level , as compared to the others.
source.24c8bf02: Lets compare the Books of Records and see what changes we can spot , that happened in a Year. What do these changes suggest , what stories and its "plots" do they project ?
source.6acf7b9c:
Occupation Vs. Education

As we have seen earlier , the majority is Bachelor's degree through out all the Occupations. We can see that those with Doctoral degree are Research scientists. And the second highest educational level - Master's degree holders are almost in every occupations , other than being a Student , majorly as Data Scientists and Research scientists.
source.c97b1428: * Definitely , what we see down below seems like a lot of facts to be read and understood by us.
source.a11fc9a5: The Story Comes to an END 🎉 !
source.ff96810b:
<font size="+1">Most of our <font color=#29EAEE>Kagglers</font> are from India , and they are students. Its great to know that Indian female users are making the community strong. We can see that Americans are decreasing in number from the community , whereas many users from other countries are joining. Overall , the users are young and zealous. So what do we need ? We need <font color=#FF3200>Encouragement</font> and <font color=#29EAEE>Upvotes</font>😉 to make the community strong and well represented. </font>

<font size="+1">So if you have enjoyed reading the story , please support the work and <font color=#29EAEE>Upvote</font>!! </font>
source.b91a4ca3:
Age Vs. Gender

Now we will see how the age of the Magicians varies with respect to their gender. The maximum number of men are from the age group of 25-29 ; where as the maximum number of women are of the age group 22-24. Otherwise , there are women of all age groups other than the oldest , decreasing in numbers with the increase in age.
source.308b3e5d:
What Do They Do ?

The magicians have differnet occupations. Although most of them are Students , there are many from various occupational backgrounds , like Data Scientists , Software Engineer and many more.
source.f1df1a57:
Occupation Vs. Country

Occupations of the Magicians , with respect to the countries shows that , the majorly represented country - India has a heterogenous mixture of all occupations , Student being the major ,Unemployed , Machine Learning Engineer ,Business Analyst and Database Engineer. USA has a mixture of Data Scientists , Unemployed , Managers, Businiess Analysts ,Database Engineers and others.
source.701b1b0f:
Country Vs. Gender

The Magicians came from all over the world. However men from India , the USA and other countries are more in numbers. It is great to see women from India are so many in numbers , more than the total number of kagglers from each country other than the USA. Those coutries which are under represented by women , men must encourage their participation and make the Community stronger and equally represented by the genders.

Obtaining the facts :

As you can see , one needs to have their facts correct to tell stories. So , first we load the data.
